N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 570.7 - Financial Assurance

State Regulations

Financial assurance, which may take the form of trust
funds, surety bonds, letters of credit, insurance, documentation of financial
capability, or other acceptable financial assurance, may be required by the

Department to ensure proper closure of facilities. The form and amount of such
financial assurance, if any, will be established by the

Department. Notes
